channel.title: trials on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in trials on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-04
item.description: Apple becomes first U.S. company to reach $3 trillion market cap (2 minute read) Apple hit a market cap of $3 trillion during intraday trading on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-10
item.description: Amazon starts making its own TVs with new Fire TV Omni and 4-Series (4 minute read) Amazon has announced its Omni and 4-Series Amazon-branded 4K Fire TVs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-30
item.description: Facebook’s next hardware launch will be its Ray-Ban ‘smart glasses’ (2 minute read) Facebook’s next product release will be its Ray-Ban smart glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-25
item.description: Pfizer trials new pill that could stop early-stage Covid in its tracks (3 minute read) Pfizer has started stage one clinical trials on an oral pill designed to be an early intervention for Covid-19.
